title: New patch 6.19
body: I need help on a problem I am having at the moment. When I enter the pvp.client page (after the log in page) it is basically frozen. I cant do anything on this page anymore and I cant play. It does load, but it is so slow (basically lagging hard) I cant do anything.  My ping and internet is fine and my laptop is new. All of the pages before this (launch page, log in) are perfectly fine. Please help me on what to do about this problem. Thanks!! (Windows 10)

replies.body: Are you using any third party programs?  Apps like play.tv or overlays have been known to cause issues, and I'd suggest removing them.  You can also go over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to rule out other possibilities like corrupt game files causing the client to crash.  You can download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to help with some of those instructions.  Let me know if this helps!
Yo this happened to me yesterday and I just went into Properties > Compatability > Run as Win 7. Fixed it for me
